template.p: Odoo for Student Organization is designed to enable you to manage all your operations fluently, from website to consultations, to accounting.

li.p: 🛍️ eCommerce : Sell memberships, merchandise, and tickets online with full website integration.
📆 Membership: Manage memberships, link them to discounts and customer profiles.
🛒 Point of Sale: Sell products or tickets in person, synced with inventory and customer data.
🪭 Events: Organize and sell tickets for conferences, talks, and parties online.
✅ Projects: Plan and manage organizational events, logistics, and working groups.
📦 Purchase: Order supplies and services for events and activities.
💳 Expenses: Track reimbursements and organizational spending.
📧 Email Marketing: Send newsletters and event announcements to members and prospects.
🎯 Social Marketing: Schedule and manage your posts across social media platforms

template.p: Whether through your eCommerce site or Point of Sale, you can sell memberships that automatically grant discounts and perks to your members and sponsors.

li.p: eCommerce: Sell memberships online, integrated with payment and member accounts.
Membership: Automatically link a sold membership to a customer profile.
Point of Sale: Also possible to sell memberships physically at booths or events.
Sales: Use price lists to offer exclusive discounts to active members.

template.blockquote:
The eCommerce module allows you to sell items and memberships with ease through your website.
Odoo Memberships connect these purchases to user profiles and grant discounts on future purchases.

div.p: Want to avoid managing memberships on a yearly basis? Make the Membership products recurrent and add a recurrent price.
Contacts will lose their membership status after each period, unless they renew their membership.

template.p: Create events, share them online, and sell tickets — all seamlessly handled through your website or Point of Sale.

li.p: Events: Configure events, assign ticket types, and track attendance.
Website: Promote your event with compelling pages and embedded ticket sales.
Point of Sale: Sell tickets at the register through the point of sale, assign them to your contacts.
Sales: Ticket revenue flows into your standard accounting flow.

template.p: From planning a gala to organizing talks or big events : manage every initiative like a pro, keep track of everyone's responsibilities, and nevermiss deadlines again.

li.p: Projects: Break large initiatives into tasks, track deadlines, assign roles.
Tasks: View progress in Kanban or Gantt formats for clarity.
Project Dashboard: keep track of all invoices, expenses, budgets, and more using the projects dashboards.

template.p: Order supplies or services directly from vendors, track costs, and maintain procurement visibility.
Request quotes, confirm orders, and track reception of goods or services such as merchandise, event equipment, and supplies for parties.
Make it easy for volunteers and team leads to submit and get reimbursed for expenses.
Expenses: Upload receipts, categorize spending, and follow approval steps.
template.blockquote: Odoo Expenses allows your members to report purchases with mobile photos or web uploads. Approvals are streamlined and expenses remain visible to leadership at all times.
template.p: Stay connected with your members and supporters with targeted, professional outreach.

li.p: Email Marketing: Build campaigns with drag-and-drop templates, track opens and clicks.
Social Marketing: Schedule and publish posts across multiple platforms (Instagram, LinkedIn, X).

template.blockquote: Odoo's marketing tools help you boost attendance, announce new products, and share community impact. Automate your content calendar and analyze performance with built-in stats.
